messages.subject: Re: Hello
messages.msgSnippet: ... Illinois. My two daughters are 14 years old and 8 years old. We have been unschooling for two months,but have homeschooled for almost two years. Hi
messages.messageBody:
>>My name is Shari and with my dh of 15 years we homeschool in
Illinois. My two daughters are 14 years old and 8 years old. We have
been unschooling for two months,but have homeschooled for almost two
years.>>

Hi Shari. Welcome to this list and to the wonderful world of
unschooling. :o)

>>I do use most of The Charlotte Mason,because of my 14 year old
daughter,she is in the end of "8th grade", also we are avide readers
in this home.>>

I think you'll find that the further you get into unschooling, the
less things like grade levels will come into play in your decision
making. I too have some ready book lists inspired from Charlotte
Mason. I don't "assign" them but they get read anyway. We love good
literature.

Life is good.
~Mary

messages.subject: Hello
messages.msgSnippet: Hi There, My name is Shari and with my dh of 15 years we homeschool in Illinois. My two daughters are 14 years old and 8 years old. We have been unschooling
messages.messageBody:
Hi There,
My name is Shari and with my dh of 15 years we homeschool in
Illinois. My two daughters are 14 years old and 8 years old. We have
been unschooling for two months,but have homeschooled for almost two
years. I do use most of The Charlotte Mason,because of my 14 year old
daughter,she is in the end of "8th grade", also we are avide readers
in this home.
Hope to get to know you,
Shari
